results.name: wordpress-deployment/wordpress-55bfd4f65b-8frmj

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.

results.name: wordpress-deployment/wordpress

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-55bfd4f65b-8frmj], expected 1

results.details:
Error: The service is missing ready endpoints because the specified pod is not ready.  
Solution: 1. Check pod status with `kubectl get pods`. 2. Inspect pod logs using `kubectl logs [pod-name]`. 3. Ensure readiness probes are correctly configured. 4. Verify pod health and dependencies. 5. Restart pod if necessary.
